Description: Head from a wooden coffin; bronze beard, strap, eye-brows and cosmetic-lines; the inlaid eyes are lost.
Bibliographic references: Taylor 2010 / Journey through the afterlife: Ancient Egyptian Book of the Dead (no. 77)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2012 July - September Mori museum, Tokyo The Book of the Dead: Journey Through the Afterlife 2012, October - November, Fukuoka Museum of Art, The Book of the Dead
